alert.note: Alert for Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 2:35PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Madison and south central Lowndes Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 235 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Blue Springs, or 8 miles southwest of Lake Park, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Park, I-75 At Exit 5, Twin Lakes, Clyattville, Cherry Lake, Hanson and Pinetta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
